summary: This document appears to be an authorization form for trading securities on behalf of an individual by Deutsche Bank Wealth Management. It outlines the responsibilities and liabilities of both the undersigned and the bank regarding trading activities.
keyFacts: The document authorizes an agent to buy, sell, and trade securities on behalf of the undersigned.
The undersigned agrees to indemnify Deutsche Bank for any losses arising from these transactions.
The authorization is a continuing one and remains in effect until revoked by the undersigned.
The document references Deutsche Bank Securities Inc. as the firm conducting the securities activities.
There are indications of confidentiality and legal protections regarding the document's contents.
